body.name: Rockin' Green Laundry Detergent, Plant based, All Natural Laundry Detergent Powder, Vegan and Biodegradable Odor Fighter, Safe for Sensitive Skin (Active Wear 90 Loads - Unscented)
body.couponInfo: Save an extra $2 on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 12 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Defeat Stubborn Stains and Odors - Rockin Green Activewear washing powder is formulated with powerful plant-based enzymes that break down even the toughest stains and odors from sweat and bacteria. Enjoy clean and fresh workout gear, including leggings and gym shorts every time!

Extend Activewear Lifespan - Experience the power of our all free and clear laundry detergent, specially formulated to safeguard high-tech workout clothes and microfibers. Naturally extend the life of your activewear and all types of fabric while enjoying a refreshing clean.

Safe For Sensitive Skin - Harnessing the power of plant-based enzymes, our unscented natural laundry detergent free and clear is safe for those with sensitive skin, fragrance sensitivities, and babies.

Extra Concentrated Formula - Our 45oz laundry odor eliminator lasts for up to 90 loads and removes years of residue as a pre-soak. Its super-concentrated formula requires just 1 tablespoon per load! Plus, its compatible with both standard and HE machines.

Cleaner Clothes, Greener Planet - Choose Rockin Green's eco laundry detergent and contribute to a cleaner world. With no bleach, dyes, optical brighteners, parabens, and SLS/SLES, our vegan and cruelty-free formula is safe for your family and the environment!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Active Wear Laundry Powder Detergent Active Wear Laundry Powder Detergent Introducing Rockin' Green's revolutionary washing powder, powered by potent, plant-based enzymes. Specially formulated to combat the toughest sweat-related odors and stains while preserving the longevity of your activewear and advanced fabrics, ensuring your clothes are clean and smell fresh every time.

Natural, Powerful Stain- and Odor- Eliminating Formula Natural, Powerful Stain- and Odor- Eliminating Formula Free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, phosphates, and optical brighteners, our All Free and Clear laundry detergent is specially crafted to eliminate the foulest odors and toughest stains. Unlike traditional laundry detergents that trap odor-causing bacteria, Rockin' Green powdered laundry detergent rinses through even tightly woven fabrics. Powered by plant enzymes, it breaks down stains and odors while preserving high-performance fabric features, such as breathability and moisture-wicking.

Rockin' Green Soap Rockin' Green Soap Rockin' Green Soap Rockin' Green Soap Safe for the Environment ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SLS & Phosphate Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Custom Enzyme Blend ✓ ✓ Works Best On Everyday Laundry for Hard Water, Cloth Diapers Everyday Laundry, Cloth Diapers Technical Fibers, Gym Clothes, Sweat, Smelly Towels All Things Kids! Play Pens, Crib Sheets, Cloth Diapers HE Compatible ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Load Count 90 Loads 90 Loads 45 Top Loads / 90 Front Loads 45 Top Loads / 90 Front Loads Scented Varieties Available ✓ ✓ Light Tea Tree Oil Scent Light Tea Tree Oil Scent

Rock the Green Lifestyle Rock the Green Lifestyle Discover the ultimate eco-conscious laundry solution with Rockin Green products - crafted with a deep commitment to both your well-being and the environment. Our Cruelty-Free, Vegan ingredients ensure that every laundry load is not only safe for you but also leaves a positive impact on our planet. Embrace a greener and guilt-free laundry routine with Rockin Green!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must-have for athletic clothes!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a lot of different laundry detergents for my athletic clothes, but this one is by far the best. It's specifically designed to remove sweat and odor from synthetic fabrics, and it really works! My clothes always come out smelling fresh and clean, even after a tough workout.I'm also impressed by how effective this detergent is at preventing musty smells. I used to have a problem with my athletic clothes getting stinky if I didn't wash them right away, but this detergent keeps them fresh for days.Overall, I'm extremely happy with this laundry detergent. It's the best I've ever used for my athletic clothes. It's effective, affordable, and easy to use. I highly recommend it to anyone who works out regularly.Pro Tip: Be sure to rinse out your synthetic workout clothes with water (I usually do this in the shower immediately following my workouts), wring them out, and hang them dry before throwing them in the hamper. This has been a game-changer when combined with this laundry detergent come laundry day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most amazing detergent ever
reviews.reviewText: I received this product recently and I am so happy I did because it is so effective and efficient. A couple of drops literally does a small load. It cleans the clothes so well. I am in love with this detergent. This is a plant based detergent and is for sensitive skin. This is perfect for the whole family. The scent is pleasant. It is subtle and not overwhelming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game Changer for Laundry Day!
reviews.reviewText: Rockin’ Green Laundry Detergent has been a game changer for my laundry routine. This detergent is simply awesome, especially for workout clothes. It does an excellent job at eliminating odors and leaving my clothes smelling fresh and clean.I usually mix it with my regular detergent and do an extra rinse, and the results have been consistently impressive. The detergent works wonders on towels too, leaving them soft and fragrant.One of the standout features of this detergent is its ability to tackle particularly stubborn odors. For instance, I often soak my husband’s shirts in this detergent, and it works miracles on them. My husband tends to have sweaty pits, and if this detergent can handle that, it can handle anything!In conclusion, if you’re looking for a reliable, effective, and powerful laundry detergent, Rockin’ Green Laundry Detergent is the way to go. It’s proven its worth in my household, and I’m confident it will in yours too. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT stuff for stinky clothes!
reviews.reviewText: I use this in conjunction with my regular liquid laundry detergent on my towels, my husband's stinky work clothes, and work out gear. It does smell a bit of tea tree oil but the scent does not linger on my clothing. My towels have lost that mildewy smell and our clothes don't have that sour sweat smell any longer. My hubby works outside in the heat so this is really impressive! I have been using this detergent for about 2 years now. I have sensitive skin and this does not cause any issues. It dissolves really well so you aren't left with any residue. I have actually mixed this with mop water to help remove dog urine odor and it was surprisingly effective when mixed with DAWN dish liquid, white vinegar, and hot water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is awesome
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because I was having an issue with a smell lingering in my Figs scrubs even after I would wash them, so I called their customer service and this is the detergent they recommended. I soaked my scrubs in it overnight and all the smell is gone. Not to mention a whole lot of other gunk! The water was literally brown. And I thought they were clean! Wow. I have used for regular washing too. I feel like it works pretty well and makes the clothes really soft. It is expensive, but I think it’s worth it. You only need a little bit, so it lasts for a while. I would def recommend for stubborn smells. Used it in our duvet cover as well. Liquid detergents are so bad for the environment, I feel like this is much more eco friendly. And easier to carry up and down from the laundry room in our building.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the Stink out of active wear - 3 year user
reviews.reviewText: I teach hot yoga and train hard in the gym, so my workout clothes get SWEATY.I've tried other "active wear" detergents, but this Rockin Green works the best for me.I typically soak my workout gear about 30 minutes in a bucket, then dump the whole bucket into the wash along with a small amount of regular detergent.One other note; I do hang my sweaty clothes up to dry while I collect a load of laundry. My wife does not appreciate me mixing my active wear with the general house laundry. Do not let your wet, sweaty laundry fester in a pile or gym bag.If your active wear gets funky, try this; it helps strip the sebum (skin secretions) from the fibers via enzymes that break it down... hence why soaking for a bit helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My partner and I are very athletic people and live in a warm state… soiled and sweaty clothing is normal. This stuff works great for removing the sweat smells out of athletic wear! We buy nice stuff too like lululemon and it has not ruined it at all. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Fabulous Stuff….saves buying new gym wear!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as my Hot Yoga clothes were starting to smell really weird and funky…despite always washing them as soon as getting back from my workout.After much googling and searching, I got this fabulous stuff!I popped ALL my workout clothes into a load and wore one set yesterday and the smell has totally GONE!!!I thought it was quite expensive at first glance for what is essentially laundry powder but this stuff really does work.
I love so much about this cleanser…its effective and smells wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 17, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t want to love this because it’s expensive but it actually does work!! I was going to throw out my husbands exercise clothes because I couldn’t get the stink out. I tried this not expecting it to work and it has!!! Will def buy again

reviews.reviewTitle: As great as everyone says it is!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this stuff. I've used it for activewear, undergarments, towels and bed sheets(the gross greasy kind🤢). I find it works really well and it hasn't been harsh on our skin or fabrics like some popular liquid detergents can be. Give it a try!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well usually. Sometimes strips dyes
reviews.reviewText: I only use this for soaks to get out stubborn odors. It usually works on the first soak but sometimes needs a second.This stuff also sometimes strips dyes. Just recently I soaked some mitts with dyed suede and almost all of the dye came off the leather. I soaked a jean jacket and no color came out.
